title: Fundamentals of acoustics
brief_description: The phenomena of hearing, and the modification of sound between its source and its hearer are studied. The velocity of sound, refraction, range of hearing, lowering of intensity, attenuation in air, the elimination of high and low frequencies, reverberation, and the focussing of sound are dealt with in detail.
